attributes.action: Tax the Rich to Avoid Cuts to Services & Benefits
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to significantly increase taxes on the wealthy to preserve services and benefits which the poor and vulnerable depend upon and to help narrow the gap between the rich and poor in the UK. Higher rates of Income Tax up to 80% on high income earners, a wealth tax, a tax on all private education and a tax on all private healthcare should be introduced in the name of fairness.
